body.name: Multifunction Magic Broom, Squeegee Broom for Floor, Rubber Broom, Silicone Broom for Floor Cleaning, Magic Broom Sweeper for Living Room, Kitchen, Bathroom-Easy Dry The Glass (Grey, 54 INCH)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 32 mins
features: 🧹VERSATILE, EFFICIENT, EASY-TO-USE: The Magic Broom is the perfect tool for cleaning up all sorts of messes, including broken glass, spilled liquids, fine dust, coffee grounds, sugar, and pet and human hair. This Magic Broom for floor can even easily sweep away sticky substances like ketchup and cracked eggs. This magic broom not only allows you to clean those hard-to-reach areas while protecting your wrists from pain, but also easily cleans up bathroom water puddles and kitchen grease.

🧹CLEANS ON MANY SURFACES: The upgraded magic broom sweeper is a multi-functional cleaning tool that is perfect for cleaning carpets, rugs, floors, living rooms, kitchens, hard floors, tiles, swimming pools, garages, and bathrooms. The rubber broom can also be used as a window squeegee for cleaning and spraying glass surfaces.

🧹UNIQUE SILICONE EDGE: Unlike ordinary brooms, this magic broom will never have dirty and unsanitary bristles. The specially designed silicone edge of the broom generates static electricity, which is used to attract hair and fine dust. It effectively cleans every corner and crevice of the house. Made of high-density PP material, this magic broom is not afraid of soaking and is easy to clean. It is noise-free and does not leave scratches.

🧹ERGONOMIC DESIGN AND UPGRADED LENGTH: The ergonomic design of the magic sweeper broom allows for easy and comfortable use. With an upgraded length of 53 inches, there is no need to bend over while sweeping, and high places can be easily reached without the use of additional tools. Additionally, the magic broom head features a 45° bevel on one side, making it effortless to remove dirt and hair from hard-to-reach corners.

🧹WIDE RANGE OF APPLICATIONS: The magic sweeper broom has a wide range of applications, making it perfect for cleaning tasks in the living room, kitchen, tile, glass, hardwood floors, bathroom, garage, windows, and more. Suitable for children, boys, girls, youth, adults, and the elderly, it also makes for a great gift for friends and family. Note: It is just a handy broom tool and can't be pressed the rod very hard when using it. Or it will come loose easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our robot vacuum does not get under our cabinets, but this is perfect! We just get everything out from the corners and cabinets before we use our robot, Hazel. We’re quite pleased at how easy it is to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than a Swiffer on wood floors
reviews.reviewText: Where has this magic broom been all my life? It smoothly gathers debris—wet or dry—from my floors, scrapes up dust that I didn’t even know was there, fits into corners and under furniture, plus I don’t have to constantly change pads. Way better than an old fashioned bristle broom on smooth surfaces, but on tiled floors I noticed it tends to skim over grout lines, leaving a few crumbs behind. Although my back appreciates the extra long handle, it could be a bit sturdier, as it sometimes gives under pressure. Also, I’m not sure how to replace the silicone strip that I know will wear away and disintegrate over time. But for right now, I’m impressed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We won’t go back to a regular broom
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We have two dogs and two cats! This thing is amazing at getting at the hair, cat litter and dirt. It’s easy to assemble, clean and use! We purchased two! One for upstairs and one for down stairs. We either use our dust pan to sweep the first up or just use our handheld vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Getting the most of the trashes! Perfect purchase for home with kids! I noticed that it gets the dust and bits of trashes. Minimalist design and easy to store!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: It's not very smooth when using it 😕. You need a dustpan that fits it. Not good in corners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: works great on my linoleum flooring

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Won't Scratch Floors
reviews.reviewText: Now this is a really cool "broom" - more like a squeegee, in fact, which makes it great for cement floors like in the garage or basement. It can be adjusted to fit pushers of various heights - just add or remove one of the two poles to make it the height that's most comfortable for you. The rubber tread on the bottom will scoop up even tiny bits that tend to cling stubbornly to the floor and won't scratch floor surfaces. I will say that it's extremely lightweight - nice in one respect, but it makes me a little concerned about how long it will last (I've told my hubby to go easy when he's doing the sweeping up).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phenomenal on hardwoods!
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a backup for the vacuum dying and I just used it to sweep the entire house this last week when it did…and I loved it! I don’t like brooms with bristles which is another reason I got this, and I’m so happy with the job it did. It’s like a squeegee for the floors, all the dust, particles and crumbs swept up so easily, along with the dust under the bed. So wonderful on the hardwoods and I was then able to mop easily. A great choice for all the sweeping!
